News

14 Mar 2023

Secondment to Bodastage Solutions Ltd in Uganda DOHL Core Scientist, Bryan Wee, spent 2 weeks in Uganda for a short placement with Bodastage Solutions Ltd. Bodastage is a team based in Kampala, Uganda that develops digital solutions for the telecommunication, education and health sector. Bodastage was founded by Emmanuel Ssebagala who has collaborated with the DOHL to develop digital tools such as THEA, LUNDAvet, PorkMart and Genopaths.

28 Dec 2022

Launch of THEA-DCT mobile app The THEA-DCT (Tracking Haulage in East Africa - Digtal Contact Tracing) tool launch event was held in Kampala. Read the news article here

17 Nov 2022

Website live!! The new DOHL website is now live
